rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78427

self.title: CDISC CDASH Unit for Duration of Treatment Interruption Terminology

definition: A terminology subset of the CDISC SDTM Unit codelist created for CDASH Unit for Duration of Treatment Interruption codelist. (NCI)
name: Unit for the Duration of Treatment Interruption
preferredTerm: CDISC CDASH Unit for Duration of Treatment Interruption Terminology
synonyms: Unit for the Duration of Treatment Interruption

terms.definition: A unit of measurement of time equal to 60 minutes.
A unit of measurement of time equal to 60 seconds.

The base unit of time in the International System of Units (SI) equal to the duration of 9,192,631,770 periods of the specified light radiation corresponding to the transition between the two hyperfine levels of the cesium 133 atom in its ground state at 0 K.
